summary: Website storefront for a single shirt priced at $25, using two provided images (front/back) and a Buy Now button that opens a popup modal with Cash App payment instructions.
architectural_notes: Payment is manual via Cash App instructions shown in a popup modal; no direct payment integration.
known_issues: Direct Cash App payment integration is not supported; only manual payment instructions can be provided.

existing_features.title: Create a single product page storefront to sell one shirt for $25.
Use the two uploaded images exactly as provided as the product photos (front and back views).

Implement a “Buy Now” interaction that opens a popup modal with manual Cash App payment instructions to send $25 to $bslimeballin and a statement that the product will be sent after payment is received.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a streetwear product page (avoid default template look), using a consistent color palette, typography, and spacing across the page and modal.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a single product page to sell one shirt for $25 using the two uploaded images as front/back photos.
Add a "Buy Now" button that opens a popup modal showing manual Cash App payment instructions to send $25 to $bslimeballin and that the product will be sent after payment.
